column5: First time coming to the Thunder Bay area, where can I stop in Thunder Bay and get some leeches?What does a pound cost?Do I need a lake trout stamp?Thanks

Check Mahumbas site. He has it all layed out.You are best to phone ahead and reserve your bait so you have no problems. I understand leech trapping has been hard this year in some areas. My favourite spots are Silver Mountain and Wiggley baits. Thet are running at around $32 Canadian a pound give or take a little. Good fishing: Frank
